sentences.en: A long line of cars was unable to pass that road hog.
sentences.cn: 一长串的车子无法超越那个挡道的汽车驾驶.

sentences.en: Drivers who hog the road leave no room for other cars.
sentences.cn: 那些占着路面的驾驶员一点余地都不留给其他车辆.

sentences.en: He is greedy like a hog.
He told me I et like a hog once, and I beat him for it. "
sentences.cn: 有一次地说我吃东西像猪一样, 我把他揍了一顿. ”

sentences.en: However there was still plenty of hog meat, as well as chickens and vegetables.
sentences.cn: 好在还有充足的猪肉, 鸡和蔬菜也不少.

sentences.en: I need part of it, I'm no hog.
sentences.cn: 我只需要其中的一部分.我不是贪得无厌的人.

sentences.en: If we start it, we shall go the whole hog.
sentences.cn: 要是着手干的话, 我们就干到底.

sentences.en: Johnny Warrick has a hog farm in Alabama.
sentences.cn: 约翰尼·沃里克在亚拉巴马州有个养猪场。

sentences.en: lives high on the hog since getting his share of the inheritance.
sentences.cn: 他自从继承遗产后过得很奢侈

sentences.en: She accused her co - star of trying to hog the limelight.
sentences.cn: 她指责合演的明星企图抢占风头.

sentences.en: She smiled at him and he said contemptuously, " You got more ham than a hog. "
sentences.cn: 她对他微笑了,他却轻蔑地说: “ 你比猪还肥. ”

sentences.en: Sugar said it was a "load of hog-wash" that he was not interested in football.
sentences.cn: 休格声称，说他对足球不感兴趣是“一派胡言”。

sentences.en: The pig is the only animal in which hog cholera is known to occur naturally.
sentences.cn: 猪是已知自然发生猪瘟的唯一动物.

sentences.en: They painted the kitchen and then decided to go the whole hog and redecorate the other rooms as well.
sentences.cn: 他们粉刷了厨房,后来又决心干到底,把其他房间也都修饰一番.

sentences.en: Well, I thought, I've already lost half my job, I might as well go the whole hog and lose it completely.
sentences.cn: 嗯，我想，反正我的工作已经丢了一半了，干脆一不做二不休，走人算了。

sentences.en: When Bob became interested in model airplanes, he went the whole hog.
sentences.cn: 鲍伯对模型飞机有兴趣后, 他就全心全意去做.
